title: Update top and bottom navigation Bars to Leverage Color Tokens
custom_steps:
GIVEN a fan has the MLB app installed

WHEN they launch the app in either light or dark mode

THEN they will see the top and bottom navigation bar background colors, text colors and icon tint colors set via Color Tokens

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14487704)

title: Remove Favorite Team Tint Color Logic on Navigation Bars (Light Mode)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a fan has a Favorite Team set

WHEN the fan launches the app

AND that fan currently has the app configured to Light Mode

THEN they will see the top and bottom navigation bars showing light mode theme.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14487705)

title: Remove Favorite Team Tint Color Logic on Navigation Bars (Dark Mode)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a fan has a Favorite Team set

WHEN the fan launches the app

AND that fan currently has the app configured to Dark Mode

THEN they will see the top and bottom navigation bars showing dark mode theme

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14487706)

title: Ensure Legacy Team Club Page Headers Stay the Same
custom_steps:
GIVEN a fan has the MLB app installed

WHEN they launch the app and navigate to the legacy team club pages

THEN they should see the headers for these pages remain the same
